Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at 18th/Blue Island
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Ashland, Cermak, Loomis and 16th: due to, street blockage near 18th/Blue Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Ashland, Cermak, Loomis and 16th: due to, street blockage near 18th/Blue Island.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute near Division/Wells
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses rerouted EB: Division, LaSalle, Maple and D'brn; WB: Walton, Clark, Oak, LaSalle and Division: due to, street blockage near Division/Wells.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Division/Wells.

Eastbound buses will operate via Division, LaSalle, Maple and Dearborn.

Westbound buses will operate via Walton, Clark, LaSalle and Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 95th and 63rd; Trains bypassing 79th
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and 63rd due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th  and 63rd due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and 63rd at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested between 95th and 63rd to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
